nccovid 0.0.17
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Get Reported Demographics by County

Source: R/get_covid_county_demographics.R
get_county_covid_demographics.Rd

Retrieve Latest Demographic data from NC DHHS.

get_county_covid_demographics(
  demographic = "age_group",
  region = NULL,
  add_population = TRUE
)

Arguments

demographic

a string, one of age, k_12, ethnicity, gender, or race

region

a string vector, could a string or vector of the counties of interest

add_population

a boolean, TRUE to add the population estimates (may not be available for all demographics)

Examples

library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘data.table’
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:dplyr’:
#> 
#>     between, first, last
out <- get_county_covid_demographics(region = "Guilford", demographic = "age")
#> Data valid as of: 2022-09-17
#> Use with caution.

out[,per_capita:=cases/(population/100000)]
#>           metric   county    week_of demographic cases deaths category
#>    1:       0-17 Guilford 2020-03-07   age_group     0      0      age
#>    2:       0-17 Guilford 2020-03-14   age_group     0      0      age
#>    3:       0-17 Guilford 2020-05-02   age_group     7      0      age
#>    4:       0-17 Guilford 2020-05-09   age_group     7      0      age
#>    5:       0-17 Guilford 2020-05-23   age_group     9      0      age
#>   ---                                                                 
#> 1064: Suppressed Guilford 2022-03-19   age_group     0      0     <NA>
#> 1065: Suppressed Guilford 2022-04-02   age_group     0      0     <NA>
#> 1066: Suppressed Guilford 2022-07-23   age_group     0      0     <NA>
#> 1067: Suppressed Guilford 2022-08-13   age_group     0      0     <NA>
#> 1068: Suppressed Guilford 2022-09-10   age_group     0      0     <NA>
#>       population per_capita
#>    1:     118602   0.000000
#>    2:     118602   0.000000
#>    3:     118602   5.902093
#>    4:     118602   5.902093
#>    5:     118602   7.588405
#>   ---                      
#> 1064:         NA         NA
#> 1065:         NA         NA
#> 1066:         NA         NA
#> 1067:         NA         NA
#> 1068:         NA         NA
ggplot(out, aes(week_of, per_capita, colour = metric))+
geom_line()+
theme_bw()+
theme(legend.position = "top")+
labs(
title = "SARS-CoV-2 Cases per 100k Residents",
subtitle = "Guilford County, North Carolina",
x = "Cases per 100k",
y = NULL
)
#> Warning: Removed 270 row(s) containing missing values (geom_path).
